renderedFields.description:
Description:
Application URL: http://smarttasks-env.eba-ep3hvh25.us-east-1.elasticbeanstalk.com/login

 

Steps:

  1. Navigate to http://smarttasks-env.eba-ep3hvh25.us-east-1.elasticbeanstalk.com/login
  2. Enter Email Address: tech.madvika@gmail.com
  3. Enter password: Welcome!
  4. Click "Sign in" button (CSS: #login-btn)
  5. Verify tasks is showing 0

Expected: Total tasks is showing 0
Actual: Total tasks should not be 0

content.text: Actual: Total tasks should not be 0

fields.summary: Login is not working in Smart tasks

parsed_issue.summary: Login is not working in Smart tasks
parsed_issue.description:
Description: 
 Application URL:      Steps: • Navigate to  •   
 • Enter Email Address:  • tech.madvika@gmail.com 
 • Enter password: Welcome! 
 • Click "Sign in" button (CSS: #login-btn) 
 • Verify tasks is showing 0 
 Expected: Total tasks is showing 0 
 Actual: Total tasks should not be 0
reproduction_steps: Step 2: Enter Email Address: tech.madvika@gmail.com in the email field
Step 3: Enter password: Welcome! in the password field
Step 5: Verify that the total tasks is showing 0

reproduction_steps.actual_result: {"selectors": ["#email", "input[name='email']", "input[type='email']", "[data-testid='email']", "//input[@name='email']", "//input[@type='email']", "text=/Email Address/i", "input[placeholder='Email Address']", "input[aria-label='Email']", "input[data-id='email']", "input[data-name='email']", "input[data-field='email']", "input[data-input='email']"], "value": "tech.madvika@gmail.com", "wait_condition": "input is visible and enabled", "validation": "", "screenshot": false}

{"selectors": ["#login-btn", "button[type='submit']", "[data-testid='login-btn']", "//button[@id='login-btn']", "//button[contains(text(), 'Sign in')]", "text=/Sign in/i", "button[aria-label='Sign in']", "button[data-id='login-btn']", "button[data-name='login-btn']", "button[data-action='login']"], "value": "", "wait_condition": "button is enabled", "validation": "", "screenshot": false}

reproduction_steps.description: Wait for page to load after login
reproduction_steps.actual_result: {"selectors": [], "value": "3000", "wait_condition": "Navigation complete and page fully loaded", "validation": "", "screenshot": false}

reproduction_steps.description: Wait for dynamic content to load
reproduction_steps.actual_result: {"selectors": [], "value": "2000", "wait_condition": "Page fully loaded with all data", "validation": "", "screenshot": false}

reproduction_steps.description: Verify that the total tasks is showing 0
reproduction_steps.actual_result: {"selectors": ["//span[contains(text(), 'Total tasks')]", "//div[contains(@class, 'total-tasks')]", "#total-tasks", ".total-tasks", "[data-testid='total-tasks']", "text=/Total tasks/i", "//label[contains(text(), 'Total tasks')]/following-sibling::*", ".stat-value", ".metric", ".count", ".display-value", "span", "div", "h1", "h2", "h3", "p"], "value": "0", "wait_condition": "Element is visible and contains expected data", "validation": "check if text matches '0'", "screenshot": true}

executed_steps.description: Wait for page to load after login
Wait for dynamic content to load
Verify that the total tasks is showing 0
executed_steps.actual_result: Element 'total tasks' found. Content: Total Tasks

reproduction_result.root_cause_analysis: The bug was not successfully reproduced based on the executed steps. The step to verify the total tasks indicated that the element 'total tasks' was found, but it did not specify the actual count of tasks. Therefore, we cannot confirm whether the total tasks are showing 0 or not from the given steps.
recommendations: Modify the verification step to explicitly check the value of the 'total tasks' element to ensure it is showing 0.
Add additional logging or debugging information to confirm the state of the 'total tasks' element after login.
